#  Fund your creative work 
Accept support. Start a membership. Setup a shop. It‚Äôs easier than you think.
## Start my page
####  It‚Äôs free and takes less than a minute!

## Memberships
##  Start a membership for your biggest fans. 
### Earn a recurring income by accepting monthly or yearly subscriptions. Share exclusive content, or just give them a way to support your work on an ongoing basis.
![creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/membership_banner_2.png)
Pro membership$15/month
Support me on a monthly basis
Email alert for new posts
Exclusive posts and messages
Join 
![creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/membership_banner_1.png)
Basic membership$5/month
33% OFF all my eBooks & services
Access to members-only Discord
Exclusive posts and messages
Join 
![creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/membership_banner_3.png)
Advanced membership$25/month
Monthly printable journal pages
Email alert for new posts
Work in progress updates
Join 
![creator](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/creator_group_1.png)286Members
$1,500Earned this month
![Memberships](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/membership_mobile_v8.png)
## Shop
## Introducing Shop, the creative way to sell. 
### The things you‚Äôd like to sell probably do not belong in a Shopify store. Shop is designed from the ground up with creators in mind. Whether it‚Äôs a 1-1 Zoom call, art commissions, or an ebook, Shop is for you.
.PDF 
Design E- book
$2004.9 (36)
Buy 
One-tap checkout
753Sales
One-tap checkout
Liked it? give rating
4 star 
$244Earnings
![Shops](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/shops_mobile_v8.png)
## Posts, audio & email
## Publish your best work
### Buy Me a Coffee makes it easy to publish free and exclusive content. Try different formats such as audio, and make it members-only to drive more memberships.
![Posts](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/posts_v8.png)
![Posts](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/homepage/images/posts_mobile_v8.png)
##  Designed for creators, not for businesses.
### We don't call them "customers" or transactions. They are your supporters.
### You have 100% ownership of your supporters. We never email them, and you can export the list any time you like.
### You get to talk to a human for help, or if you just like some advice to hit the ground running.
### You get paid instantly to your bank account. No more 30-day delays. 
##  Make 20% or more, compared to other platforms.
### Not just a membership
#### Creators who previously only used Patreon noticed a massive increase in earnings after accepting one-off payments.
### 6 new languages
#### We now support Spanish, French, Italian, German and Ukrainian‚Äîmaking it easier for your global audience to support you.
### Email marketing
#### Instead of paying separately for email marketing tools like Mailchimp, send unlimited emails to your fans for free.
### Being friendly converts
#### ICYMI, we make it simple and fun for your supporters. While you cannot put a number on feelings, it tends to show on the results.
### Your privacy comes first
#### Receive fan support safely without disclosing your identity or address. We‚Äôll do the heavy-lifting.

generated_description:
**Buy Me a Coffee: Empowering Creators to Monetize Their Passion**

Founded in 2018 and a proud graduate of Y Combinator's Winter 2019 batch, Buy Me a Coffee has quickly become a favorite platform for over a million creators. Headquartered in San Francisco, this fintech-focused startup is not just about transactions; it's about fostering genuine connections between creators and their supporters.

**Mission and Vision**  
Buy Me a Coffee was created to help creators fund their work effortlessly, making it simple for fans to show their appreciation. The platform allows creators to accept one-off payments, set up membership tiers, and even sell their products‚Äîall designed specifically for creative individuals, not traditional businesses. Think of it as a cozy corner where creators can comfortably live off their passion and creativity, while their supporters lend a helping hand.

**What They Offer**  
Buy Me a Coffee provides a wide array of tools:
- **One-off Support**: Fans can buy a "coffee" (essentially a tip) to support creators with a few taps‚Äîfun and straightforward.
- **Memberships**: Creators can establish ongoing relationships with their audience through monthly or yearly subscriptions, offering exclusive content and benefits.
- **Shop**: This feature allows creators to sell everything from art commissions to eBooks, all with a creator-centric design.
- **Content Publishing**: Users can publish posts, audio, and exclusive materials, making it easy to engage with their audience effectively.

With a team of around 30 people, Buy Me a Coffee has streamlined the monetization process for creators, ensuring they retain full control over their supporters‚Äîno middlemen, no delays in payouts, and a focus on user privacy.

**Growth and Expansion**  
As the platform expands globally, it now supports creators in six languages, making it more accessible to a diverse audience. They combine the power of community support with essential features like email marketing (no extra tools needed), ensuring creators can engage with their supporters effectively.

**Why It Matters**  
In a world where monetizing creativity can be a struggle, Buy Me a Coffee stands out by putting creators first. It‚Äôs not just a financial transaction; it‚Äôs a community where appreciation flows both ways. As the saying goes, ‚Äúa rising tide lifts all boats‚Äù‚Äîand Buy Me a Coffee is helping creators navigate those waters confidently.

For more information, visit their [website](https://www.buymeacoffee.com).
